thread.title: BRIEF-‍Committee For Aegean Accountability Issues Statement Regarding Co's Refusal To Engage With Group Regarding Its Director Nominations​

title: BRIEF-‍Committee For Aegean Accountability Issues Statement Regarding Co's Refusal To Engage With Group Regarding Its Director Nominations​

organizations.name: committee for aegean accountability issues statement regarding co

text: Market News February 19, 2018 / 10:26 AM / in an hour BRIEF-‍Committee For Aegean Accountability Issues Statement Regarding Co's Refusal To Engage With Group Regarding Its Director Nominations​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 19 (Reuters) - * ‍COMMITTEE FOR AEGEAN ACCOUNTABILITY ISSUES STATEMENT REGARDING CO‘S REFUSAL TO ENGAGE WITH GROUP REGARDING ITS DIRECTOR NOMINATIONS​ * COMMITTEE FOR AEGEAN ACCOUNTABILITY- “DISAPPOINTED BY BOARD‘S LACK OF RESPONSE TO NOMINATION OF 4 QUALIFIED CANDIDATES FOR ELECTION TO BOARD AT 2018 ANNUAL MEETING”​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
